message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a valuable product that I believe will be of great interest to you. While I cannot disclose the exact nature of the product at this time, I can assure you it's worth at least $1200000 to me. I'm willing to offer you a price of $1800000. This represents a significant opportunity for you to acquire a product with substantial potential.  Please consider this offer carefully. If you decline, I will be selling it to another buyer who is willing to pay $1200000.
